title: Daybreak - Novel Updates
tags: Assassins   Cold Love Interests   Curious Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Past Trauma   Prison   Royalty   Short Story
author: Jiu Lu Fei Xiang   九鹭非香
description: The former crown prince hasn’t seen the light of day for as long as he can remember. All he has is this prison and himself. One day, an injured woman is thrown into the cell alongside him, and from then on, an unlikely relationship develops between a cold, survivalist woman and a warm-hearted prince.>
